description: In Windows, ANNOT files are saved to the \​Digital Editions\​Annotations\​ directory within the user's Documents directory. For Mac OS X, they are saved to the [user]/​My Documents/​Digital Editions/​Annotations/​ directory. ANNOT files often use the title of the ePublication as their filename prefix.
Since ANNOT files use XML formatting, you can view them with a text editor.
